discharge_summary.line_3_a: After the usual preoperative investigations that revealed no contraindication for the
discharge_summary.line_5_a: Both the operative procedure and the postoperative course were uneventful.
discharge_summary.line_6_a: The patient was ventilated for a few hours and discharged from the ICU the next day.
discharge_summary.line_7_a: The subsequent postoperative course was uncomplicated and the woundhealing was per primam.
discharge_summary.line_8_a: The sternum was stable and our patient was fully mobilised during the stay in the ward
discharge_summary.line_9_b: we could discharge the patient in good health
